Class Car

java.lang.Object
  Car

public class Car
extends java.lang.Object

The Car class tracks fuel remaining in the car as it is driven based on fuel efficiency

Version:
(12 September 2014)
Author:
(selevitt)

Constructor Summary
Car(double fuelEfficiency)
          Constructor for a car of the specified fuel efficiency
 
Method Summary
 void assGas(double gallons)
          Adds the specified number of gallons of fuel to this car's tank
 int sampleMethod(int y)
          Updates the fuel in this car's tank based on the prespecified number of miles driven and this cars fuel efficiency
